ENGLISH.START_MSG: Hello, this is auto channel-commenting userbot. Help Chat: @HelpSupportChat GitHub Repo: Click Here. Programmed By: @SastaDev Powered By: @SastaNetwork © SastaNetwork 2022, Inc.
ENGLISH.HELP_MSG: To use the auto comment user bot, you need to add ID of channel(s) into config.json at CHANNEL_ID. You can get id of any channel by sending .id feature of program. Usage: .id (reply to channel's message) .id username/link of the channel.
ENGLISH.CHANGE_LANG: • To change language, you need to send .setlang YOUR LANGUAGE Example: .setlang hindi OR change language to your choice of language by editing in config.json.
ENGLISH.ADDED_CHANNEL_ID: Added channel ID successfully! It'll be now used for auto-commenting!
ENGLISH.REMOVED_CHANNEL_ID: Removed channel ID successfully! It'll be now no longer used for auto-commenting!
ENGLISH.CHANNEL_ID_ALREADY_ADDED: • This channel ID is already added.
ENGLISH.CHANNEL_ID_NOT_EXIST: • This channel ID is not added.
ENGLISH.REPLY_TO_CHANNEL_MSG_1:
• Reply to channel's message while doing this.
OR
.id username/link of the channel.
ENGLISH.REPLY_TO_CHANNEL_MSG_2:
• Reply to channel's message while doing this.
OR
.add username/link of the channel.
ENGLISH.REPLY_TO_CHANNEL_MSG_3:
• Reply to channel's message while doing this
OR
.remove username/link of the channel.
ENGLISH.ID_USAGE: Usage: .id (reply to a channel's message) .id username/link of the channel.
ENGLISH.LANG_NOT_AVAILABLE: Sorry, this language is notavailable yet! You can add/translate it by contacting to @SastaDev. Thank You!
ENGLISH.LANG_SETTED: Done! New language has been set!
